description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. The world has been destroyed but don't let that keep you down in this, the final installment of Penny Arcade's On the Rain-Slick Precipice of Darkness series. Explore a huge deadly world and fight off strange adversaries with your own monster team! From the creators of Cthulhu Saves the World and Breath of Death VII.
description.short: The world has been destroyed but don't let that keep you down in this, the final installment of Penny Arcade's On the Rain-Slick Precipice of Darkness series. Explore a huge deadly world and fight off strange adversaries with your own monster team! From the creators of Cthulhu Saves the World and Breath of Death VII.
